page.title: 09Saturday Morning_Zoe Marsden
page.content: I get up every Saturday morning at about 8.30am.I watch Saturday morning show or Number 73.Then I sometimes go down to Jenny,s or she comes up.We play on our bikes then we usually go to town.This week I am going for some new shoes.Jenny has dinner at our house we usually have salad.Then we sometimes go swimming we duck each other under and practice how many lengths we can do.I have my tea Jenny would have fish and chips too.Then we would watch a film that we had hired from the video shop.Something like Bedknobs and Broomsticks that is one of my favourite films we would watch the normal television and have some sweets and a cup of tea or coca.Then we would play games and some times like Guess Who? or Connect Four. After we would have some supper like
